description:
1. Create two different loan products
2. Go to product mix and choose one and restrict the other; Admin -> Product -> Product Mix
3. Then apply a loan of one of the product to an active client, approve and disburse it 
4. Then apply another loan form the other product, approve it.

For screenshots refer the  following link:
name: Mifos X Web App - The Error For Co-existence Of Loans Should Show Up During Approval
